title: Can't ban the new champs?
body: Is anyone else having the issue where you can't ban the new champs? And don't give me that "Oh because no one on the enemy team has them" because they've clearly picked them and we can't ban them for shit. Its annoying and irritating.

replies.body: I can't seem to replicate the issue. Can you confirm whether you're still experiencing any issues banning these champions?
